subject: Ponzi Schemes
Baseball
Suits and Litigation
Hedge Funds
lead_paragraph: An investment firm started by owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz had to pay back nearly $13 million two years ago when a hedge fund run by the scion of a wealthy New Orleans family collapsed.
snippet: An investment firm started by owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz had to pay back nearly $13 million two years ago when a hedge fund run by the scion of a wealthy New Orleans family collapsed.
